author: rding
msg: PIG-1977: 'Stream closed' error while reading Pig temp files

author: simoneg
msg: Added method to obtain linearized view structures

author: julianfoad
msg: Remove useless code from svn_wc__maybe_set_read_only().  A follow-up to
(svn_wc__maybe_set_read_only): It doesn't make sense to operate on an
unversioned path so just return the error if that is the case. The
comment here said "we still want to set it to read-only" which didn't
make sense (because we can't query the svn:needs-lock property of an
unversioned file) and didn't match the code. I also checked and found
that this condition never occurs in a test suite run.

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-3415] Making sure contexts are injected into cloned JAXB providers
[CXF-3415] Opting for a more straightforward approach for making JAXB providers endpoint-specific
Updated HTTPS client to use WebClient and JAXRSClientFactory
Fix the CI build by upgrade neethi to 3.0.0
- Added support for validating IssuedToken policies against received Assertions.
Change to using the smx bundle for opensaml.  That bundle actually works
Make sure policy assertions are only added to the vocabulary and
assertioninfomap once to keep the maps smaller.
Remove spring dependencies from codegen plugin
Reverting spring depdenncy removal as there is a problem if the calling project has a depdendency on spring
Point to correct path for schemas
Fix some more catalogs for offline building
- Added support for validation of SAML holder-of-key and sender-vouches requirements
